name: Email Trigger (IMAP)
semantic_context: Triggers the workflow when a new email is received
natural_language_description: 这是 Email Trigger (IMAP) 节点。主要用于: Triggers the workflow when a new email is received

mailbox.name: mailbox
mailbox.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mailbox Name | 默认值: INBOX

postProcessAction.name: postProcessAction
postProcessAction.description: What to do after the email has been received. If "nothing" gets selected it will be processed multiple times.
postProcessAction.natural_language_description: 参数名: Action | 作用: What to do after the email has been received. If "nothing" gets selected it will be processed multiple times. | 默认值: read

downloadAttachments.name: downloadAttachments
downloadAttachments.description: Whether attachments of emails should be downloaded. Only set if needed as it increases processing.
downloadAttachments.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download Attachments | 作用: Whether attachments of emails should be downloaded. Only set if needed as it increases processing. | 默认值: False

format.name: format
format.description: The format to return the message in
format.natural_language_description: 参数名: Format | 作用: The format to return the message in | 默认值: simple
available_options: RAW (值: raw) - Returns the full email message data with body content in the raw field as a base64url encoded string; the payload field is not used
Resolved (值: resolved) - Returns the full email with all data resolved and attachments saved as binary data
Simple (值: simple) - Returns the full email; do not use if you wish to gather inline attachments

dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName.name: dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName
dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName.description: Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachments. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0"
dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Prefix Name | 作用: Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachments. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0" | 默认值: attachment_

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: customEmailConfig (值: None) - Custom email fetching rules. See node-imap's search function for more details.
allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to connect even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
forceReconnect (值: None) - Sets an interval (in minutes) to force a reconnection
